unnormalised: My cousin, Suresh, a small-time artist, lost a case in the Delhi High Court last month. Apparently, he unintentionally infringed on some copyright of a big Bollywood production house; case no. WP(C) 1234/2024, you know?
normalised: My cousin, Suresh, a small-time artist, lost a case in the Delhi High Court last month. Apparently, he unintentionally infringed on some copyright of a big Bollywood production house; case number W-P-C one two three four slash two thousand and twenty four, you know?
